mapper.insert: insert into TstCustomFieldOption (label,value,ordr,fieldId, createTime,deleted,disabled) values (#{label},#{value},#{ordr},#{fieldId}, NOW(),FALSE,FALSE)
mapper.select:
SELECT o.* FROM TstCustomFieldOption o
WHERE o.fieldId = #{id} AND o.deleted != true AND o.disabled != true
ORDER BY o.ordr ASC
